ygData.messageBody:
Just spice up your CV and you are ready for job...

To Apply For Job:
http://www.signajob.com/?id=2876






























-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For Moderators:

If you are a group moderator and no longer wishes to receive emails, please change my "post message settings".

For Members:

If you wish not to receive future emails, simply login to the yahoo group through which you are receiving my emails and click
on a link "Edit membership" which you can find in front of your email address. You can change your message delivery option in
this page in "Step 2" to suit your needs OR email your group moderator to change my account "post message setting".
